      • release

        public void release​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    boolean startingInTile)
        Controls the release event. When drag starts in tilepane adds a new imageView of the same plant to the center pane. Also checks for collisions among ImageViews according to spread.
        Parameters:
        event - the mouse event
        name - the name or key of the plant being released
        startingInTile - boolean to inform if drag started in tile pane

        Polygon - drawn by user

      • drawPlot

        public void drawPlot()
        Iterates over the boundary ArrayLists in Garden to draw plot to screen. Calls iteratePlot() to translate the plot

      • drawFreehandPart

        public void drawFreehandPart()
        Iterates over just the freehand portion outline ArrayList in Garden

      • drawToCanvas

        public void drawToCanvas​(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
        Draws the garden onto any sized Canvas including plot boundaries and conditions
        Parameters:
        canvas - the Canvas to draw onto

      • iteratePlot

        public void iteratePlot​(java.util.ListIterator<Vector2> itr,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Vector2> list,
                        boolean isPolygon)
        Scales and translates all the points onto the screen by calling drawLine in View
        Parameters:
        Iterator - itr
        ArrayList - representing which plot boundary list, outline or polygonCorners
        boolean - isPolygon representing if the boundary is a polygon
        double - scale

      • settingDimensionLine

        public void settingDimensionLine​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
                                 boolean isPressed)
        Called when user is drawing. Updates the canvas of the relevant view and calculates the number of pixels from the starting and ending point of line
        Parameters:
        MouseEvent -
        Boolean - describing whether mouse is pressed for the first time

      • settingLength

        public void settingLength​(double length)
        Called after user hits enter after inputting the dimension of their line, in feet. Sets the length per pixel in model by dividing user inputted value by the number of pixels in the line
        Parameters:
        double - representing the user inputted line dimension

      • getLepInfo

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Lep> getLepInfo()
        Gets the lep directory
        Returns:
        the map for info and lep

        Returns:
        the information and the corresponding PlantSpecie

      • switchViews

        public void switchViews​(java.lang.String next)
        Called when a button is pressed in order to determine the next screen The next action is determined by the string passed to the function
        Parameters:
        String - describing the next action to be shown

      • goingToGardenDesign

        public void goingToGardenDesign()
        Sets models gardendesign attribute to true

        the budget
